General.Name: Shanghai Fengyuzhu Exhibition Co Ltd Class A
General.Description: Shanghai Fengyuzhu Culture Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the digital new media technology research and development activities in China. It is also involved in digital content production, distribution, and management business. The company was formerly known as Shanghai Fengyuzhu Exhibition Co., Ltd. Shanghai Fengyuzhu Culture Technology Co., Ltd. was found in 2003 and is based in Shanghai, China.
